summary: The video discusses individuals who have changed their last names to avoid being recognized due to their famous family backgrounds. It mentions Malia Obama using 'Malia Ann' for her directorial debut at Sundance, Angelina Jolie's full birth name, Stephen 'Sky Blue' Gordy's real name, and Nicolas Cage's stage name change from Coppola to avoid being associated with his famous uncle, Francis Ford Coppola.
keywords: Nepo babies, Malia Obama, Angelina Jolie, Stephen Gordy, Sky Blue, Nicolas Cage, Francis Ford Coppola, Sundance Film Festival, Fast Times at Ridgemont High
